item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (802 points | 250 comments)
2. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (77 points | 25 comments)
3. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (223 points | 172 comments)
4. PayPal (USA) will automatically share data about you to participating stores (100 points | 28 comments)
5. Apple macOS 15 Sequoia is officially Unix (59 points | 33 comments)
6. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (14 points | 1 comment)
7. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (529 points | 84 comments)
8. First Greenhouse Gas Plumes Detected with NASA-Designed Instrument (29 points | 1 comment)
9. Analyzing New Unique Identifier Formats (UUIDv6, UUIDv7, and UUIDv8) (21 points | 7 comments)
10. DuckStation (93 points | 35 comments)
11. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (5 points | discuss)
12. Machine learning and information theory concepts towards an AI Mathematician (64 points | 12 comments)
13. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (361 points | 247 comments)
14. Steam's new disclaimer reminds everyone that you don't own your games (26 points | 23 comments)
15. IcePanel (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers in Vancouver ( | hide)
16. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (114 points | 22 comments)
17. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What Have Researchers Learned? – Illinois Fishing Hub (46 points | 14 comments)
18. Modded-NanoGPT: NanoGPT (124M) quality in 3.25B tokens (52 points | 4 comments)
19. A mountain? Multistorey car park? Both? Inside Shanghai's £225M summit (3 points | discuss)
20. Ask HN: If you were rewriting Emacs from scratch, what would you do differently? (28 points | 48 comments)
21. Ask HN: What breakthrough helped you build and maintain better relationships? (68 points | 58 comments)
22. Turkish language has a gossip tense (109 points | 89 comments)
23. Swarm, a new agent framework by OpenAI (185 points | 74 comments)
24. The ACF plugin on the WordPress directory has been taken over by WordPress.org (224 points | 69 comments)
25. Six transplant patients in Brazil contract HIV from infected organs (133 points | 58 comments)
26. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (338 points | 48 comments)
27. Tiny Drones Do Distributed Mapping (40 points | 2 comments)
28. Nvidia Stock Rises. AMD's New AI Chip Is Not Competitive (29 points | 37 comments)
29. Choosing solitude (58 points | 45 comments)
30. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (5 points | discuss)
